citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The PG 600 medication on hand expired March 2023, and the Nuflor expired April 2023.
Each exhibitor shall establish and maintain programs of adequate veterinary care that include the use of appropriate
methods to prevent, control, diagnose, and treat diseases and injuries.
Use of expired drugs may not have the desired effect and lead to unnecessary and prolonged pain and suffering.

Approximately 3 adults and 7 children let themselves into an enclosure housing 11 angora goats and 12 pygmy goats.
There was no attendant seen to oversee the interaction of the public with the goats.
A responsible, knowledgeable, and readily identifiable employee or attendant must be present at all times during periods
of public contact.
A readily identifiable employee or attendant must be present at all times during periods of public contact to ensure the
safety of the animals and the public.
To be corrected from this day forward, May 17, 2023

The food for the juliana pig, and the pot-bellied pig is kept in a mini-refrigerator in the pig barn. When the refrigerator was
opened a strong smell of soured fruit was noted, and when the container of fruit and vegetables was removed from the
refrigerator it was discolored and had a slimy film.
Animals shall be fed food that is wholesome, palatable, and free from contamination and of sufficient quantity and nutritive
value to maintain all animals in good health.
Ensure that all food fed to animals is wholesome and free from contamination to maintain the animals in good health.
To be corrected from this day forward, May 17, 2023
This inspection and the exit interview were conducted with the animal care manager.
Additional Inspectors:
KURT HAMMEL, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2)  Repeat
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
The PG 600 medication on hand expired March 2023, and the Nuflor expired April 2023. 
Each exhibitor shall establish and maintain programs of adequate veterinary care that include the use of appropriate 
methods to prevent, control, diagnose, and treat diseases and injuries. 
Use of expired drugs may not have the desired effect and lead to unnecessary and prolonged pain and suffering. 
2.131(d)(2) 
   
Handling of animals. 
Approximately 3 adults and 7 children let themselves into an enclosure housing 11 angora goats and 12 pygmy goats.  
There was no attendant seen to oversee the interaction of the public with the goats.  
A responsible, knowledgeable, and readily identifiable employee or attendant must be present at all times during periods 
of public contact. 
A readily identifiable employee or attendant must be present at all times during periods of public contact to ensure the 
safety of the animals and the public. 
To be corrected from this day forward, May 17, 2023 
3.129(a) 
   
Feeding.

The food for the juliana pig, and the pot-bellied pig is kept in a mini-refrigerator in the pig barn.  When the refrigerator was 
opened a strong smell of soured fruit was noted, and when the container of fruit and vegetables was removed from the 
refrigerator it was discolored and had a slimy film. 
Animals shall be fed food that is wholesome, palatable, and free from contamination and of sufficient quantity and nutritive 
value to maintain all animals in good health. 
Ensure that all food fed to animals is wholesome and free from contamination to maintain the animals in good health. 
To be corrected from this day forward, May 17, 2023 
 
This inspection and the exit interview were conducted with the animal care manager. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
KURT HAMMEL, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICER n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
